item.title: How to Setup a Cronjob for a Tool Installed via pipx
item.description: The company I work for finally says good-bye to Subversion, and while migrating to git, we also decided to move to GitHub and no longer host the repositories inhouse. While I think GitHub should be pretty reliable, data loss still could happen, so I decided we need some backup. I use all-repos to manage open source repositories on a daily basis. Its all-repos-clone command looks like a great fit to backup the repositories to a local virtual machine.
